# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe holds significant value for those seeking high-quality solutions. Given its exceptional features and benefits, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to you at an introductory price of $150. This offer is tailored to recognize your discerning taste and commitment to excellence. Don't miss out on this chance to experience the unparalleled benefits of our product. Let me know if you have any questions or need more information. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
